content: nothing screams cozy winter time like a sleepy alolan vulpix curling up on your lap especially when winter in reality consists of 5°c and rain materials to make alolan vulpix you will need a 2 5mm and a 3 5mm crochet hook regular yarn in white and light blue as well as fluffy white wool plus some black thread for the eyes felting supplies and wool in dark blue for the ears you can totally crochet this instead a tapestry needle and scissors stuffing a stitch marker to help you keep track of the start of the round please note that you can make vulpix using any size crochet hook and yarn weight for a smaller or bigger result using dk yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook vulpix should be about 13cm tall stitches & abbreviations the pattern is written using us crochet terms in continuous spirals you will need to know the following kinds of stitches to make him magic_ring magic_ring chaning chain single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease preferably using the invisible decrease method increase increase if you like what i m doing please consider following me over at twitter @rinamogrynaart and/or supporting me on ko-fi @rinamogryna <3
